Queries.GetModoandURL:
SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN "U_BO_Mdo" = 'PRU' THEN "U_BO_URLWSRPRU" ELSE "U_BO_URLWSRPRD" END AS "URLTFHKA", "U_BO_Mdo" AS "Modo", "U_BO_MI" AS "ModoIntegracion", "U_BO_PCR" AS "ProtocoloComunicacion", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_LlE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "TokenEmpresa", (SELECT TOP 1 "U_BO_PwdE" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP" WHERE "U_BO_Status" = 'Y') AS "TokenPassword", (SELECT COUNT(*) + 500 AS "Contador" FROM "@BOTREDRPT") AS "Consecutivo", "U_BO_RutaXML" AS "RutaXML", "U_BO_RutaPDF" AS "RutaPDF"
FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOEBILLINGP"
Queries.sGetDocumentsDownload: SELECT TOP 10 * FROM "@BOTREDRPT" WHERE "U_BOTCWSXML" IS NULL OR "U_BOTCWSPDF" IS NULL ;
Queries.GetInvoices:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A."Code" ASC) AS "#",
CASE WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '00' THEN 'Cargado' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '01' THEN 'Entregado' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '02' THEN 'Aceptación expresa (DIAN)' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '04' THEN 'Reclamo (DIAN)' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '10' THEN 'Acuse de recibo (DIAN' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '11' THEN 'Rechazado (DIAN)' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '12' THEN 'Recibo del bien y/o prestación del servicio' WHEN "U_BOTEED" = '13' THEN 'Precargado' ELSE '' END AS "Estado",
'' AS "DocEntry", "U_BOTNF" AS "Num_Fac_Pro", '' AS "Num_Fac_Preeli", '' AS "Num_Fac_SAP", '' AS "Serie_Numeracion", B."LicTradNum" AS "Codigo_cliente", "U_BOTNI" AS "NumeroIdentificacion", "U_BOTNRS" AS "Nombre_del_Cliente", '' AS "Fecha_Documento", '' AS "Fecha_vencimiento", '' AS "Condicion_de_Pago", "U_BOTMT" AS "Total_Documento", "U_BOTCUFE" AS "CUFE", "U_BOTFE" AS "Fecha_emision", "U_BOTFR" AS "Fecha_recepcion", "U_BOTHE" AS "Hora_emision", '' AS "Fecha_Hora_Apro_DIAN",
CASE WHEN "U_BOTNDP" IS NULL AND "U_BOTNDD" IS NULL THEN 'Sincronizado' WHEN "U_BOTNDP" != NULL AND "U_BOTNDD" IS NULL THEN 'Preeliminar' WHEN "U_BOTNDP" != NULL AND "U_BOTNDD" != NULL THEN 'Contabilizado' ELSE '' END AS "Estado_SAP", CASE WHEN "U_BOTPAXML" IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ('%PathImages%'||'Download.bmp') END AS "DescargaXML", CASE WHEN "U_BOTPAPDF" IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ('%PathImages%'||'Download.bmp') END AS "DescargaPDF", ('%PathImages%'||'Aceptar.bmp') as "ImageAceptar", ('%PathImages%'||'Cancelar.bmp') as "ImageCancelar", "U_BOTPAXML" AS "RutaXML", "U_BOTPAPDF" AS "RutaPDF"
FROM "@BOTREDRPT" A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN LOCATE(T0."LicTradNum",'-') = 0 THEN T0."LicTradNum" ELSE SUBSTRING(T0."LicTradNum",1,LOCATE(T0."LicTradNum",'-')-1) END AS "LicTradNum" FROM "OCRD" T0) B ON A."U_BOTNI"=B."LicTradNum" WHERE CAST("U_BOTFE" AS DATE) BETWEEN '%FI%' AND '%FF%'

FROM "@BOTREDRPT" A WHERE 1=2
